ctx: intros A B R WO H x.
exceptions.tactic: specialize (ClassicalChoice.choice A B R H) as [f Hf].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type R : A -> B -> Prop WO : relation B H : well_order WO x : forall x : A, exists y : B, R x y The term "A" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "?A -> ?B -> Prop".

original: intros A B R WO H x. specialize (ClassicalChoice.choice A B R H) as [f Hf]. exists f. intros x0. apply Hf.
